== Corgao (626638) ==
      
Corgao is a village in the [[Pernem]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 2208.55 hectares and harbouring 1497 households with total population of 6639 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PERNEM]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 3389 and female population is 3250. Scheduled Caste Population is 138 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626638<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 5409
* Literate male population: 2907 (85.78%)
* Literate female population: 2502 (76.98%)
